title.rendered: FAIL EARLY, FAIL OFTEN, FAIL FORWARD | WILL SMITH

content.rendered:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4A0OBG6YmQ

*Subscribe to My Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCe224…

Owning a business is an uphill battle with many hurdles along the way. Are you cut out to be an entrepreneur? Can you get through these up’s and downs?

It would be great if more businesses were successful and lasted for decades. However, history shows us that’s not likely to happen. Factually more than 20% of businesses fail in their first year of operation. That is a staggering 1 out of 5.

I’m human and I also deal with these trials and tribulations on a daily basis. But the difference between me and “them”? I will stop at nothing to succeed.

2018 is here, and I’m ready to take over the world! Who’s coming with me?

 

Chris A. Hughes
